item.title: Continuous Monitoring With Tail Fails
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: If you can’t get tail command to continuously monitor a file, then read on. I was working on a script yesterday, a part of which depended on continuous monitoring of a text file. I had used our trusty old “tail” command for this but while testing by manually putting in some data into the file, it was failing but curiously it was working fine when used in actual scenario. Befuddled, I did a simple test.
